gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.conditions
Class ComparisonCondition<T>

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.conditions.ComparisonCondition<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of object being checked.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Condition<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
EqualTo, GreaterThan, GreaterThanOrEqual, LessThan, LessThanOrEqual
public abstract class ComparisonCondition<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Condition<T>

Abstract Condition based on a comparison done by a comparator.

Constructor Detail

ComparisonCondition

public ComparisonCondition(java.util.Comparator<T> comparator,
                           T comparedValue)
Creates a new LessThan object.

Parameters:
comparator - Comparator doing the comparison.
comparedValue - Value being compared against objects being checked by the condition.

ComparisonCondition

public ComparisonCondition(T comparedValue)
Creates a new LessThan object. This constructor will use the default comparator for comparable objects (ComparablesComparator). This comparator can be used only if comparedValue is Comparable.

Parameters:
comparedValue - Value being compared against objects being checked by the condition.
